name: Combat Readiness Conditioning
description: Combat-specific strength, endurance, and reflex training to improve striking power, resilience, and movement control.

workout_groups.name: Striking Power & Speed
workout_groups.description: Developing maximum striking power, explosive force, and rapid attack speed.

workouts.name: Heavy Bag 3-Minute Rounds
workouts.description: Strike the heavy bag with hands, elbows, knees, and kicks for full-body conditioning.

workouts.name: Explosive Elbow & Knee Combinations
workouts.description: Throw rapid elbow and knee combinations to develop fluid striking power.

workouts.name: Hook & Uppercut Power Shots
workouts.description: Practice explosive hook and uppercut punches to develop knockout power.

workouts.name: Fast Twitch Reaction Drills
workouts.description: Throw rapid punches with maximum speed and minimal tension to improve reaction time.

workouts.name: Speed Kicking Rounds
workouts.duration: 3 sets of 20 fast kicks per leg
workouts.description: Perform rapid kicking combinations to enhance lower body speed and endurance.

workouts.name: Jab Speed & Accuracy Drill
workouts.description: Throw fast, controlled jabs to increase hand speed and target accuracy.

workouts.name: Slap & Tap Hand Speed Drill
workouts.description: Rapid open-hand slaps to train fast-twitch striking speed.

workouts.name: Drop Step Punching Drill
workouts.description: Step forward explosively while throwing a fast punch to generate power.

workouts.name: Backfist Speed Drill
workouts.description: Rapid backfists to develop explosive reaction-based striking.

workouts.name: Body Shot Power Drill
workouts.duration: 3 sets of 15 body shots per side
workouts.description: Deliver forceful body punches to improve striking power in close quarters.

workouts.name: Heel Pivot Power Punches
workouts.description: Utilize a full-body pivot to generate more power behind punches.

workouts.name: Explosive Superman Punch
workouts.description: Jump forward into a powerful superman punch to build explosive upper-body force.

workouts.name: Knee Raise to Jumping Knee Strike
workouts.description: Train the knee chambering technique before executing explosive knee strikes.

workouts.name: Wall Resistance Straight Punches
workouts.description: Push against a wall while throwing punches to increase arm explosiveness.

workouts.name: Kick-Recoil Speed Drill
workouts.description: Focus on quick recovery between kicks to increase striking efficiency.

workouts.name: Fast Hand Combos (1-2-3-4)
workouts.description: Train rapid 4-punch combinations with full extension and retraction.

workouts.name: Double Tap Jab & Cross
workouts.description: Throw quick successive strikes to develop attack speed and rhythm.

workouts.name: Defensive Strike Counter Drill
workouts.description: Simulate counter-striking by slipping or dodging before executing an attack.

workouts.name: Explosive Spinning Backfist
workouts.description: Develop rotational power with a fast-spinning backfist.

workouts.name: Snap Kick to Side Kick Drill
workouts.description: Flow from a quick snap kick into a powerful side kick for combination striking.

workouts.name: Push Kick to Hook Kick Combo
workouts.description: Combine a forceful push kick with a fast, whipping hook kick.

workouts.name: Shadowboxing Speed Rounds
workouts.description: Throw rapid, controlled strikes with maximum speed in the air.

workouts.name: Sledgehammer Ground Slams
workouts.description: Mimic a downward striking motion to build explosive forearm strength.

workout_groups.name: Martial Arts Strength
workout_groups.description: Developing the core power, stability, and kicking strength necessary for effective combat techniques.

workouts.name: Low Stance Kicks
workouts.description: Develop strong, balanced low kicks using Silat and Muay Thai techniques.

workouts.name: Static Horse Stance
workouts.description: Hold a deep horse stance to develop endurance in the legs and core.

workouts.name: Single-Leg Balance Kicks
workouts.description: Perform slow, controlled kicks while balancing to improve stability and precision.

workouts.name: Explosive Side Kicks
workouts.description: Develop powerful side kicks with maximum speed and impact.

workouts.name: Chambered Knee Strikes
workouts.description: Hold and drive the knee forward for enhanced Muay Thai-style knee power.

workouts.name: Step-Up Knee Strikes
workouts.description: Step onto an elevated platform and drive the knee upward to build explosive leg power.

workouts.name: Horse Stance Punch Drills
workouts.description: Hold a low horse stance while delivering rapid straight punches for stability and arm endurance.

workouts.name: Elevated Heel Raise Hold
workouts.description: Stand on your toes and maintain balance for ankle and lower leg strength.

workouts.name: Isometric Side Kick Hold
workouts.description: Hold a fully extended side kick position to develop balance and leg strength.

workouts.name: Front Kick Chamber Holds
workouts.description: Hold the knee at a chambered front kick position to build core and leg endurance.

workouts.name: Horse Stance Core Twists
workouts.description: While holding a deep horse stance, twist the torso side to side for core activation.

workouts.name: Weighted Front Kicks
workouts.description: Attach ankle weights and perform front kicks to increase leg power.

workouts.name: Knee Drive to Roundhouse Kick
workouts.description: Train fluid striking transitions by combining knee strikes with roundhouse kicks.

workouts.name: Jumping Front Kicks
workouts.description: Develop explosive lower-body power by jumping into a front kick.

workouts.name: Side Lunge to Chambered Kick
workouts.description: Build stability by shifting weight through a side lunge before chambering a kick.

workouts.name: Hanging Leg Raise Kicks
workouts.description: Use a pull-up bar to develop kicking core strength by raising legs in a kicking motion.

workouts.name: Palm Strike Core Engagement
workouts.description: Deliver powerful palm strikes while engaging the core for stability.

workouts.name: Low Stance Lateral Steps
workouts.description: Move side to side in a deep stance to improve leg endurance and mobility.

workouts.name: Weighted Horse Stance Holds
workouts.description: Hold a horse stance while carrying hand weights to increase resistance.

workouts.name: Controlled Jumping Side Kicks
workouts.description: Train dynamic side kicks with controlled jumping for enhanced explosiveness.

workouts.name: Sliding Hook Kicks
workouts.description: Improve mobility by performing smooth, sliding hook kicks.

workouts.name: Low Kick Counter Training
workouts.description: Strengthen the lower body by absorbing impact and countering with a kick.

workouts.name: Wall-Supported Front Kicks
workouts.description: Use a wall for support and practice controlled front kicks to improve balance and precision.

workouts.name: Assisted Horse Stance Holds
workouts.description: Perform a horse stance with hands resting lightly on a surface for stability while focusing on proper form.

workouts.name: Seated Knee Raises
workouts.description: Sit on the floor or a chair and raise your knees towards your chest to strengthen the lower abs and hip flexors.

workouts.name: Slow Chambered Kicks
workouts.description: Hold the knee chambered for 3 seconds before executing a slow front, side, or roundhouse kick.

workouts.name: Toe Tap Balance Drill
workouts.description: Stand on one leg and lightly tap the toe of the other foot in front, to the side, and behind to improve foot control and balance.

workouts.name: Standing Knee Holds
workouts.description: Lift one knee to waist height and hold, engaging core muscles for balance.

workouts.name: Step-Through Lunges
workouts.description: Perform lunges with a step-through motion to improve leg coordination and strength.

workouts.name: Basic Pivot & Turn Drill
workouts.description: Practice controlled pivots to strengthen footwork and rotational movement for kicks.

workouts.name: Side Leg Raises
workouts.description: Raise your leg to the side with control to improve lateral leg strength for side kicks.

workouts.name: Heel Raise Balance Drill
workouts.description: Stand on the balls of your feet and hold for ankle and calf stability.

workout_groups.name: Impact Conditioning
workout_groups.description: Toughening the body to withstand strikes and improve overall durability in combat.

workouts.name: Light Shin Tapping
workouts.description: Use a softer surface or lightly tap shins together to begin conditioning for impact training.

workouts.name: Hand Toughening (Palm & Knuckles)
workouts.description: Lightly strike a padded or softer surface with open palm and knuckles to begin wrist and hand conditioning.

workouts.name: Soft Core Striking
workouts.description: Tap the midsection lightly with an open hand or small object to develop awareness and tolerance to impact.

workouts.name: Basic Forearm Clashes
workouts.description: Gently clash forearms against a softer object to build wrist and bone resilience gradually.

workouts.name: Calf & Achilles Toughening
workouts.description: Light tapping and mild pressure on calves and Achilles to prepare for greater impact over time.

workouts.name: Light Knee Striking on Bag
workouts.description: Beginner knee strikes on a bag with minimal force to condition the patellar area safely.

workouts.name: Soft Impact Bodyweight Drops
workouts.description: Gently drop into a low squat or controlled fall to prepare for hard landings.

workouts.name: Wrist & Knuckle Isometric Holds
workouts.description: Press knuckles or wrists into a padded surface to strengthen bones and connective tissue.

workouts.name: Basic Shin Rolling (Foam Roller or Light Object)
workouts.description: Use a foam roller or light object to gently roll the shins, starting shin conditioning.

workouts.name: Wall Knuckle Pushes
workouts.description: Press knuckles lightly against a wall and apply pressure to condition hands for striking.

workouts.name: Heel Tap Conditioning
workouts.description: Tap heels lightly against a surface to build tolerance for impact.

workouts.name: Light Body Slaps
workouts.description: Perform light body slaps to begin toughening skin and muscle for combat readiness.

workouts.name: Controlled Shin-on-Bag Rolls
workouts.duration: 3 sets of 10 slow rolls per leg
workouts.description: Gently roll shins along the punching bag to gradually increase bone conditioning.

workouts.name: Partner Shoulder Clashes
workouts.description: Light shoulder bumps with a partner to develop impact resistance.

workouts.name: Soft Back Fall Rolls
workouts.description: Roll backward and absorb impact smoothly to prepare for hard falls.

workouts.name: Standing Shock Absorption Drills
workouts.description: Jump slightly and land with soft knees to develop impact tolerance.

workouts.name: Progressive Core Striking (Padded Object)
workouts.description: Use a padded or soft surface to lightly strike the core and gradually build resistance.

workouts.name: Shin Conditioning with Light Object
workouts.description: Tap the shin gently with a softer object like a rubber mallet or padded stick to strengthen the bone gradually.

workouts.name: Breath Training for Impact
workouts.duration: 3 sets of 10 deep breaths per session
workouts.description: Practice breathing techniques to exhale upon impact and control pain tolerance.

workouts.name: Shin Toughening Drills
workouts.duration: 3 sets of 10 bag strikes per leg
workouts.description: Condition the shins by striking the bag to develop resistance to impact.

workouts.name: Forearm & Wrist Strength
workouts.description: Develop forearm durability using staff training and wrist isometric holds.

workouts.name: Core Hardening
workouts.description: Perform medicine ball slams onto the abs to condition the core for combat.

workouts.name: Controlled Impact Abs Training
workouts.description: Take controlled strikes to the midsection to develop resistance.

workouts.name: Forearm Clash Training
workouts.description: Lightly clash forearms against a partner or training object to build blocking strength.

workout_groups.name: Reflex & Dodge Training
workout_groups.description: Enhancing agility, reaction speed, and evasive movement for defensive combat maneuvers.

workouts.name: Hand-Eye Coordination Drills
workouts.description: Dodge and react to fast-moving hand attacks to train reflexes.

workouts.name: Rolling & Evading Practice
workouts.description: Practice tactical recovery movements and rapid evasions.

workouts.name: Fast Twitch Dodging
workouts.description: Use quick head movements and footwork to avoid simulated attacks.

workouts.name: Parry & Counter Reflex Training
workouts.description: React to an incoming strike by parrying and countering instantly.

workouts.name: Slipping & Ducking
workouts.description: Train defensive movements to avoid high and low attacks.

workouts.name: Basic Head Movement Drill
workouts.description: Move head side-to-side and up-down to simulate avoiding slow incoming strikes.

workouts.name: Shadow Dodging
workouts.description: Stand in front of a mirror or shadowbox and practice dodging imaginary strikes.

workouts.name: Slow Slipping Drill
workouts.description: Perform slow-motion slips to build muscle memory for dodging punches.

workouts.name: Wall Reflex Tap Drill
workouts.description: Tap a marked spot on a wall as quickly as possible when prompted.

workouts.name: Side-Step Evasion
workouts.description: Step quickly to the left or right to evade an incoming attack.

workouts.name: Basic Reaction Time Drill
workouts.description: React to a sound cue by moving in a predetermined direction.

workouts.name: Controlled Drop-Step Drill
workouts.description: Perform controlled drop steps to get used to quickly changing direction.

workouts.name: Ball Drop Reflex Drill
workouts.description: Catch a ball dropped from shoulder height as fast as possible.

workouts.name: Dodging Rope Swing
workouts.description: Tie a rope to a fixed point and duck or slip as it swings.

workouts.name: Basic Roll Recovery
workouts.description: Perform slow, controlled rolls to improve tactical recovery.

workouts.name: Reaction Step Drill
workouts.description: Step quickly forward or back based on an external cue (clap, voice, light).

workouts.name: Hand-Pat Dodging Drill
workouts.description: A partner taps toward your shoulder or head, and you dodge lightly.

workouts.name: Slow-Motion Weaving
workouts.description: Weave under an imaginary punch in slow motion to develop fluidity.

workouts.name: Light Foot Shuffle Drill
workouts.description: Shuffle forward and backward rapidly to build quick footwork.

workouts.name: Partner Dodge & Tag Drill
workouts.description: Your partner tries to tap your shoulder while you dodge.

workouts.name: Fast Duck & Roll Drill
workouts.description: Duck under an imaginary attack and immediately roll forward.

workouts.name: Random Direction Sprint Drill
workouts.description: Sprint in a random direction based on a partner's call.

workouts.name: Lateral Dodging Between Cones
workouts.description: Move quickly side-to-side between markers, simulating an evasive fight motion.

workouts.name: Controlled Backpedal Dodging
workouts.description: Move backward quickly in response to an imaginary attack.

workouts.name: Reaction Clap Drill
workouts.description: React as quickly as possible by moving or dodging when a clap is heard.

workouts.name: Leg Feint Step-Back Drill
workouts.description: Simulate a fake step before retreating or moving in a different direction.

workouts.name: Shoulder Shrug Evasion
workouts.description: Raise shoulders and tuck chin to avoid incoming jabs and straight punches.
